labels.practices_subtitle: Persistent growth of the SELF through vessels.

messages.select_clone_first: Select a clone in the list first.
messages.select_living_clone: Select a living clone to upload.
messages.already_busy: Already busy. Cannot gather {resource} right now.
messages.no_clone_applied: No clone applied to the spaceship. Apply one first.

tutorial.welcome: Welcome. Build your base and field clones into expeditions.
tutorial.step1: STEP 1 — Build Womb (consumes Tritanium, Metal Ore, Biomass).
tutorial.step2: STEP 2 — Grow a clone (costs a slice of your SELF + materials).
tutorial.step3: STEP 3 — Apply the clone to your spaceship, then run an expedition.
tutorial.step4: STEP 4 — Upload the clone to your SELF to bank progress; future clones begin stronger and costlier.
